headline: Higher Refining Margins Help Marathon Petroleum Beat Q2 Profit Estimate
summary: Marathon Petroleum reported strong second-quarter earnings, beating analyst estimates, driven by increased refining margins, higher motor fuel demand, and robust utilization rates, echoing similar success for Valero Energy.

raw.headline: Higher Refining Margins Help Marathon Petroleum Beat Q2 Profit Estimate
raw.summary: Marathon Petroleum reported strong second-quarter earnings, beating analyst estimates, driven by increased refining margins, higher motor fuel demand, and robust utilization rates, echoing similar success for Valero Energy.

headline: Marathon Petroleum Reports Six-Year Low in Environmental Incidents
summary: Marathon Petroleum Corp. and MPLX LP released their 2024 Sustainability Report and 2025 Perspectives on Climate-Related Scenarios, detailing their environmental progress, community engagement, and climate risk management.

headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +22.98% and +10.33%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Marathon Petroleum: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: FINDLAY, Ohio (AP) — Marathon Petroleum Corp. MPC) on Tuesday reported second-quarter earnings of $1.22 billion. On a per-share basis, the Findlay, Ohio-based company said it had net income of $3.96.
